synopses.synopsis: The Chicago Theater of the Air grew out of a listener survey conducted by WGN in 1940, which revealed that large blocks of its audience appreciated the music of opera and the escapism of drama. - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
